tool_description: Shorten URLs using this service with an option to pass custom alias. e.g. https://sqzy.us/trending-news
name: Short URL Service
title: Short URL Service

api_list.name: Shorten URL
api_list.description: Shortens the URL. Pass an alias if required else alias is autogenerated.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://short-url-service1.p.rapidapi.com/save"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "short-url-service1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://short-url-service1.p.rapidapi.com/save"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "short-url-service1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
